entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 p.m. CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
